Installation instructions¶

Dependencies¶

  • cmake-3.15 or newer

Installation¶

Linux and Windows¶

Open the build_Linux.sh or build_Windows.bat file, change paths for cmake and python if necessary.

For Linux:

$ sh build_Linux.sh

For Windows:

> build_Windows.bat
  • trekker executable will be installed under build/Linux/install/bin or build/Windows/install/bin depending on the OS.
  • Static and shared libraries are installed under build/Linux/install/lib with library header build/Linux/install/include/trekker.h.
  • A python package will be prepared and installed under build/Linux/install/extensions/python/dist.

MAC OS¶

Not tested.
